snippet: Shareholders are suing the Lloyds Banking Group of Britain and former bank executives, saying they were misled over its rescue of HBOS in the depths of the financial crisis in 2008.
abstract: American shareholders are suing the Lloyds Banking Group of Britain and former bank executives, saying they were misled over its rescue of HBOS in the depths of the financial crisis in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders are suing the Lloyds Banking Group of Britain and former bank executives, saying they were misled over its rescue of HBOS in the depths of the financial crisis in 2008.
